inclusion.criterion: Chronic pancreatitis of at least 3 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least 5 episodes of pain in the past 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pain score of at least 3 on a visual analog scale (VAS) of 0-10
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute pancreatitis episode at the time of enrolment and/or during follow-up.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Ongoing pain at the time of enrolment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other chronic diseases (including end organ damage related to diabetes).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Adverse life event in the family in the past 6 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active substance use (alcohol, smoking, smokeless tobacco, Illicit drugs).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy showing pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
